command.name: info
command.abstract: show peer configuration and status details

description.p: This command shows attributes of a peer as well as elements of its current status. This is useful for debugging purposes.

Here is an example of the information provided: cbgp> bgp router 1.0.0.2 peer 1.0.0.3 show info
address : 1.0.0.3
asn : 1
router-id : 0.0.0.0
state : OPENWAIT
snd-seq : 1
rcv-seq : 0
source-addr: 1.0.0.2
last-error : success
